p:
Here, the coefficient ρ is the mosquito recruitment term (expanded below); a is the biting rate; β
h→ v and β
v→ h are the human-to-mosquito and mosquito-to-human transmission rates, respectively; 1/ γ
h and 1/ η
h represent the intrinsic incubation and human infectivity periods; 1/ γ
v and μ
v represent the extrinsic incubation period and mortality rate for mosquitoes. The biting rate, EIP and mortality rates are temperature-dependent, detailed below. The state variables and parameters used for our model are displayed in Tables 1 and 2, respectively. Preliminary exploration of parameter values was performed to determine their permissibility for transmission and to define model starting conditions (see S1 File).
